Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_lens_med_NOAP
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 8.1 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 19250 # config.det_offset = 0 # config.srce = 30 # config.guide = 'lens' # config.apx = -23 # config.bs = 4 # config.beamcenterx = 92.98 # config.beamcenterz = 92.13
# config.drive() # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 8.1) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 8.1) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(19250, 0) driveEntRotAp(30) driveGuide('lens') selBs(4) sics.set('beamcenterx', 92.8225) sics.set('beamcenterz', 92.3852)
